thread.title: Brown signs climate law mandating 50% renewable power by 2030
thread.title_full: Brown signs climate law mandating 50% renewable power by 2030 - San Francisco Chronicle

author: David R. Baker
title: Brown signs climate law mandating 50% renewable power by 2030
text:
Photo: Michael Short, Special To The Chronicle Governor Jerry Brown shakes hands with Senator Hanna-Beth Jackson, D-Santa Barbara, author of the California Fair Pay Act Ð SB 358, following the Governor's signing of the bill into law during a ceremony held in the Craneway Pavilion at Rosie the Riveter-WWII Home Front National Historical Park in Richmond, CA Tuesday, October 6, 2015. Governor Jerry Brown shakes hands with Senator Hanna-Beth Jackson,...
By the end of 2030, half of California’s electricity will come from the wind, the sun and other renewable sources under a new law that sets one of the country’s most ambitious clean-energy targets. Governor Jerry Brown shakes hands with Senator Hanna-Beth Jackson, D-Santa Barbara, author of the California Fair Pay Act Ð SB 358, following the Governor's signing of the bill into law during a ceremony held in the Craneway Pavilion at Rosie the Riveter-WWII Home Front National Historical Park in Richmond, CA Tuesday, October 6, 2015. Governor Jerry Brown shakes hands with Senator Hanna-Beth Jackson,...
By the end of 2030, half of California’s electricity will come from the wind, the sun and other renewable sources under a new law that sets one of the country’s most ambitious clean-energy targets.
